Description: Receiving materials and goods arriving at the warehouse, arranging and storing materials and equipment, and disbursing them to the concerned authoritiesStocktaking.Receiving materials to be stored in warehouses and ensuring that they conform to the specifications mentioned in purchase or supply orders or samples.Inspect all inventory for damage and keep records of damage.Organizing and arranging the goods, equipment and other materials that are provided to the warehouse, arranging them in their correct places, and documenting their data.Prepare the materials, prepare them, and disburse them to the concerned authorities according to disbursement vouchers in accordance with the approved disbursement mechanism.Determine the needs of goods and materials when the stock reaches the demand limit and save the incoming and outgoing transactions related to the warehouse.Participate in inventory counts and reconcile physical count results to books and records balances.Operate inventory management machines such as forklifts.Keeping daily records.Maintain inventory and control resources.work as one teamSearch for informationeffective communicationPhysical endurancework as one teamSearch for informationeffective communicationPhysical enduranceSkills
Skills: • Searching for information and the ability to develop
• Effective communication with the work team.
• Knowledge of various warehouse management systems, preferably knowledge of the Odoo system
